page.title: 06BEECHAM'S FACTORY IN L/H
page.content: Beecham's 40 year old Lucozade factory in Little Hulton produces Lucozade and other carbonated drinks. Although a highly automated factory it employs over 200 people and operates 24 hours a day. Most shop floor employees do not require qualification to work as labourers, stores and warehousemen, production workers, fork lift truck drivers. Other employees are supervisors, maintenance men, engineers, chemists, production managers, factory and personnel managers. Workers are provided with snooker tables, dart boards, a retired staff social organisation and non-contributory pension scheme. This factory is very efficient, highly structured, and well organised.
